mapper.select: select CAT_NAME, TITLE, MAIN_IMAGE, IMAGE_ITEM, TO_CHAR(CUR_SUM, '999,999,999,999') as NOW_SUM, TRUNC((CUR_SUM/TARGET_SUM)*100, 0) as PERCENT, TARGET_SUM, TO_CHAR(CLOSINGDATE, 'YYYY"년"MM"월"DD"일"' ) AS DEADLINE, CONTENT, IMAGE, EMAIL, NICKNAME from ITEM natural join MEMBER natural join CATEGORY natural join SELLER where ITEM_CODE = #{item_code}
